thag19.1:38.2: vupasamo dukhassa → vūpasamo dukkhassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thag19.1:39.1: Taṇhā avijjā → taṇhaṃ virajjañca (sya1ed, sya2ed); taṇhaṃ avijjañca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thag19.1:41.2: rājadasī → rājādisī (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); rājadisī (pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag19.1:43.2: cāraṇikaṃva → vāraṇikaṃva (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | dassayaṃ → dussahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); dassahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thag19.1:48.1: Dhitipparaṃ → dhī dhī paraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thag19.1:58.2: pāvusaabbhamāliniṃ → pāvisi abbhamālinaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); ... māliṃ
thag19.1:58.3: ramissaṃ → ramissasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
